name: AXM Capital
overview: AXM Venture Capital Ltd is a venture capital firm specializing in seed and early stage companies that are or will become SME. The firm invests through its fund The Creative Capital Fund. The firm invests in creative industries including advertising; architecture; arts and antiques; crafts; design; designer fashion; digital; media, video, film and photography; computer games software and electronic publishing; music and the visual and performing arts; publishing; television; and radio. It seeks to invest in unquoted companies based in London and will also consider investments in companies that are relocating to Greater London.
